title: Mirror Of Kong Ho
description: This 1905 tongue-in-cheek book is ostensibly the letters of a dutiful son to his Chinese father describing his encounter with and experience of Western civilization in late nineteenth century London.  The author is delightfully humorous. - Summary by david wales
